column4: I am have been testing ubuntu for some days now and i think its really slow desktop in comparison to windows xp x64, i have amd 3200+ , 1024 ram ... i have tried xfce and gnome and both seem much slower than windows. i would really like to use ubuntu but i want it to be fast, is there any way to get it as fast as win xp?
but as i said, i would gladly use ubuntu if it was just a bit faster... if there is any way to speed it up ?
Maybe if you told us a few more things, like how you feel it's slow, and what kind of video card you have?
